name: Flying ninja boy
description: I am playing Flying Ninja Boy challenge. Are you ready to be challenged? Flying ninja boy is a new and exciting endless runner coin collector game, where you have to collect the coins to maximize your score and avoid the moving electric bombs. You can throw spears at the bombs to destroy them before they kill you, but, do it precisely. You may destroy your precious coins as well. Let's see who can score more in this challenge because it is not going to be a piece of cake as it is the "Flying Ninja Boy: the challenge." PLAY NOW...
